front.title: The Entity Category SAML Entity Metadata Attribute Type

abstract.t: This document describes a SAML entity attribute which can be used to assign a category semantics to an entity.

note.title: Requirements Language
note.t: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119.

section.title: Introduction
section.t: This document describes an attribute for use by the EntityAttribute extension to SAML metadata. The attribute is used to denote the type or category of the SAML entity.

section.title: Syntax
section.t: When asserted in SAML metadata the Entity Category attribute MUST be represented using an Attribute element with @NameFormat urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:attrname-format:uri and @Name http://macedir.org/entity-category. The Entity Category attribute MAY contain multiple AttributeValue elements.
